constraints.name: valid_operation
constraints.description: 每次操作的减数不能大于当前值

constraints.name: state_transition
constraints.description: 每次操作后，当前值会更新，并且返回更新后的单位比特数

constraints.name: termination_condition
constraints.description: 当猜测到初始值时，必须输出答案并结束当前测试用例
constraints.formal: if (guessed_n == n) then output ' ! n ' and move to next test case
